conditions.name: Usual test
conditions.description: A typical reseach of a person who assesses his condition as normal

conditions.name: Post-flight test
conditions.description: Monitoring the condition of the flight crew after work

conditions.name: Post-trip test
conditions.description: Monitoring the condition of locomotive drivers after work

conditions.name: Clinical test or rehabilitation
conditions.description: Test or rehabilitation session carried out in the treatment of a patient in a hospital or on an outpatient basis. The patient's condition may change during the treatment; norms cannot be built.

conditions.name: Test under other circumstances
conditions.description: A test conducted under conditions not listed.
